body_html:
Thanks for willing to contribute! Unfortunately, I’m already writing a PR to update the doc. Sorry about this.
…
On Fri, Oct 13, 2017 at 12:44 Ozan Çağlayan ***@***.***> wrote: Okay. So the explanation that should appear for every padding argument of Conv* et *Pool* methods be it in torch.nn or torch.nn.functional should be: *Zero-padding added to both sides of the input. Can be a single number or a tuple.* If you approve, I'd be happy to send a PR. — You are receiving this because you commented. body_text:
Thanks for willing to contribute! Unfortunately, I’m already writing a PR
to update the doc. Sorry about this.
…
On Fri, Oct 13, 2017 at 12:44 Ozan Çağlayan ***@***.***> wrote:
 Okay. So the explanation that should appear for every padding argument of
 Conv* et *Pool* methods be it in torch.nn or torch.nn.functional should
 be:
 *Zero-padding added to both sides of the input. Can be a single number or
 a tuple.*

 If you approve, I'd be happy to send a PR.

 —
 You are receiving this because you commented.

body:
Thanks for willing to contribute! Unfortunately, I’m already writing a PR
to update the doc. Sorry about this.

On Fri, Oct 13, 2017 at 12:44 Ozan Çağlayan <notifications@github.com>
wrote:

> Okay. So the explanation that should appear for every padding argument of
> Conv* et *Pool* methods be it in torch.nn or torch.nn.functional should
> be:
> *Zero-padding added to both sides of the input. Can be a single number or
> a tuple.*
>
> If you approve, I'd be happy to send a PR.
>
> —
> You are receiving this because you commented.
> Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub
